title: This Week in WWE (TV show)
text:
This Week in WWE is an American <a href="television%20program">television program</a> produced by <a href="WWE">WWE</a> which mainly recaps events taking place on "<a href="WWE%20Raw">Raw</a>" and "<a href="WWE%20SmackDown">SmackDown</a>". The show premiered on February 9, 2009.
The program is similar to "<a href="WWE%20Experience">WWE Experience</a>". The difference being is that "WWE Experience" has a longer running time of 60 minutes, whereas "This Week in WWE" is 30 minutes.
